semaphore

Class BinarySemaphore

  • java.lang.Object
    • semaphore.BlockingSemaphore
      • semaphore.BinarySemaphore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SemaphoreInterface

    public class BinarySemaphore
extends BlockingSemaphore
    Blocking binary semaphores.
    Version:
    January 2020
    Author:
    Hugh Osborne

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BinarySemaphore(java.lang.String name, int initialValue)
      This is a binary semaphore, so the limiting value is predefined as being one.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class semaphore.BlockingSemaphore

        getName, poll, vote

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • BinarySemaphore

        public BinarySemaphore(java.lang.String name,
                       int initialValue)
                throws SemaphoreError
        This is a binary semaphore, so the limiting value is predefined as being one.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of this semaphore
        initialValue - the initial value for this semaphore
        Throws:
        SemaphoreError - if the initial value is not zero or one (i.e. is negative, or greater than the limit).
